name: Home Sweet Home (itch) (kateycampbell)
description:
Your parents got a divorce and sold the house. Now you need to return to your hometown for the first time in years to pack up all of your childhood room. Explore your old and forgotten memories as you decide what to do with all of your stuff. 

This game was made for PIGSquad Summer Slow Jams: June 2021. The themes were exploration and forgotten places. 

(It's currently a bit of a WIP and I hope to update and expand on it more in the future!!)

Music
